attributes.action: BAN THE WEARING OF ANY FACE COVERING beyond the entrance of ANY taxpayer funded building.
attributes.additional_details: We have the right to know and record the facial features - for security and our own protection - of ANYBODY entering a publicly funded building.  Anybody who is obliged to appear at one of our court buildings is to have their face covering FORCIBLY removed if they attempt to enter the building without removing their face covering.
